color.$description: Used for the foreground of a disabled action.
Used for the background of a disabled action.
Used for the border of a disabled action.

default.$description: Used for the foreground of outlined and borderless neutral actions.

hover.$description: Used for the foreground of a neutral action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the foreground of a neutral action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the foreground of a neutral action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the background of a neutral action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the background of a neutral action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the background of a neutral action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the background of a neutral action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the border of a neutral action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the border of a neutral action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the border of a neutral action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the border of a neutral action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the foreground of a confirm (positive) action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the foreground of a confirm (positive) action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the foreground of a confirm (positive) action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the foreground of a confirm (positive) action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the background of a confirm (positive) action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the background of a confirm (positive) action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the background of a confirm (positive) action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the background of a confirm (positive) action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the border of a confirm action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the border of a confirm action in the hover state.

focus.$description: Used for the border of a confirm action in the focus state.

active.$description: Used for the border of a confirm action in the active state.

default.$description: Used for the foreground of a danger (destructive) action in the default state.

hover.$description: Used for the foreground of a danger (destructive) action in the hover state.
